name: Phobia (itch) (BeardNecessities)
description: Phobia is an asymmetric, competitive horror game. One player plays as a human, whose goal is to explore a haunted mansion and collect fuses in order to turn the power back on and escape alive. Support for virtual reality devices has been added to the game to make the human player's experience much more immersive. The other player plays as the monster that haunts the mansion, who must use a wide array of tools at their disposal to terrify and eventually kill the human.
